      • addRecord

        public void addRecord​(int courseID,
                      int studentID,
                      int[] SessionChoice,
                      int numComponents,
                      double examWeight,
                      double[] courseworkWeight)
        Add a new record to record database
        Parameters:
        courseID - identification number of the course
        studentID - identification number of the student
        SessionChoice - identification number of the lecture,tutorial or laboratory the student is registered to
        numComponents - number of components of coursework
        examWeight - weightage of the exam marks
        courseworkWeight - weightage of coursework marks
